channel.title: VPS help, i will reward!
channel.description:
I need help!
My vps went online today so i just installed all the prgramms like ( java, chrome etc etc ). I put deathlypvp v3 on the vps and made it work. it says that it is online ( 0 players online etc). Only when i try to log on on a client or check my server status with the vps ip its says that the server is offline?
What do i need to do so my vps ip is conected with the source.
If you help me get my server online! I will reward you with paypall!
PLZ help me!

item.title: VPS help, i will reward!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Rewards are not offered on these forums. Anyways, try shutting firewall of on the VPS, if you can’t, add port exceptions for 43594 TCP/UDP.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS help, i will reward!
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stPred Gh0stPred
item.description:
@Gh0stPred wrote:

Make sure the client is connecting to the VPS IP Address in Client class. If it’s the first time doing this then search for 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 and replace it with the IP address for the VPS. If you don’t know what your IP address is go onto http://www.whatsmyip.org/

Read full topic
